title: Mood Disorder
summary:
[From the Same Studio as the Manhua "Girl and Science"]

Everybody is crazy except me. But is it a misfortune to be sane in a crazy world?

title: Even though you know it’s crazy
S-Class Butler
summary:
Butler Kim is the raid leader of the VR game Metariaand in real life the guardian of two cats. One day, a mysterious boss forces him into the unwanted Butler class, where he must serve monsters and do menial chores.

Just as he begins adjusting to this strange new role, an unbelievable truth is revealed:

"A cat… logged into the game?!"

His beloved pet Peechu has entered Metaria.

But Peechu is not just Peechu. The "Master" who reclassified Butler Kim and has been giving him orders is actually Kalinas, the Incarnation of Darkness, now trapped inside the cat’s body.

With the world’s balance at stake, Butler Kim is tasked with carrying out Kalinas’s dark mission. Yet instead of worrying about the will of darkness, is he simply happy to adventure through a fantasy world with Peechu?

title: Why Do You Love Me When I Refuse Your Request?
summary:
Shuelina has only ever wanted to be loved as she grew up in an orphanage.
But after her birth father rejected her in a previous life, she tries to find a family who will accept her in this one.
Luckily, Archduke Bylot and his sons fall for her indomitable spirit, and they shower her with the love she has longed for.
But once they find out she's the long-lost imperial princess, can she be a part of their family?
Or will she have to go back to the people who sent her away in the first place?

(Source: Tapas)

___
Alternative Raw: [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/-/4185)
Official JP translation: [Piccoma](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/173647)

title: I Became the Contract Daughter of the soon-to-be-ruined Family
summary:
I thought I had regressed from this ragged life, but why has my time-limited life remained the same?
I'm ruined... is this how I should live my life...?

"This time, I'll get adopted by a normal family, and live in comfort for the rest of my life!"

Step by step, I'm going to take revenge against the one behind my death, and I'll protect what's left of my small and precious life!

However, did I put in too much effort?

"Anisha, you're perfect."

"I'm going to make this child a future professor."

All I wanted was to survive...

"Well, somehow, you’ve passed. I'll have to adopt this brat."

I ended up with a tycoon I didn't expect.
One whose household will be massacred in a few years!

How do I know that?
Me too! I didn't want to! Know that!

But what can I do? The milk has already been spilt.
I'll just live in bliss while acting as the real daughter during my 5 years contract, then I'll leave!

However...

"...I happened to pick this up on the way home."
"Father, you're the best!"
"I know."

...Something's wrong.

"I checked this out 'myself', and inspected it 'in person'. There's nothing to be grateful for."
"Father, you're a genius!"
"I know this too."

No, well, something's REALLY wrong.

**

I became fond of this unique and strange family, but...

"The five years contract we signed,"
"Let's nullify it."

While looking straight into my eyes, dad announced the termination.

"I can help you, but you'll still die anyway."

Not only that,
But death came under my nose too.

Will I be able to survive?

title: The Genius Who Sees Through the World
summary: As a child, Shin Woo-jin was kidnapped and locked away in a warehouse, forced to live as a slave. But against all odds, he was rescued and finally stepped into the outside world. Though free, Woo-jin wasn’t like other children. He had an extraordinary gift—the ability to read people. By observing the smallest facial expressions and unconscious gestures, he could see through their thoughts, emotions, and intentions with near-perfect accuracy. Like a profiler, like a modern-day Sherlock, Woo-jin learned to navigate the world, one observation at a time. But for someone who sees too much, living an ordinary life is the hardest thing of all. All he ever wanted was a peaceful, simple life. But the world had other plans. “As I thought… living a normal life is far too difficult.”

title: Astral Pet Store
summary:
In the era of astral pets, only the might of pets was essential! However, making the pets stronger has always been a slow and arduous process for pet warriors. That was until the appearance of a mysterious pet shop that changed everything!

The weakest skeleton could slay a great golden dragon with a single strike after training at this pet shop! Even the humble watchdog of the shop possessed ten legendary skills, and the female worker in the shop claimed to be a Goddess...

As for what the shopkeeper Su Ping thinks: I'm merely training these cute pets to become exceptional overlord beasts. What? Is it not normal?
- - -
In the era of beasts, pet strength determines everything! The battle pet master works hard and slowly to improve the strength of the pet. Until a mysterious pet store came out of nowhere!

In just a few days of cultivation, the lowly skeleton can kill the golden dragon with a single slash. Does the guard dog have ten secret skills of pet beats? The working girl even calls herself a god...

As for the owner, Su Ping: Isn't it a regular practice to breed cute pets into prehistoric king beasts?

title: The Saint Who Wishes for Death Makes a Pact with the Cursed Prince
My Wicked Little Girl
summary: One day, Charlotte Bennett transferred to Aoyagi Akihito's class. Her proper and refined mannerisms and adorable appearance captured the hearts of his classmates, but Akihito calmly takes a step back, feeling that she "lives in a different world." However, helping Charlotte's lost sister, Emma, throws his daily life into upheaval...?!

title: Predatory Marriage
summary:
Lea wrote a suicide note ahead of the wedding.
Because she'll die after the first night.

It was the miserable end of a princess who devoted her entire life to her country and the royal family.
Before she gives up her life, Lea plans her final revenge on the royal family.

It is to become a new bride who has lost her innocence.

"Why did you give up your first experience like this? Don't you want to run away?
"I... want to die."

It was an impulsive remark because he was just a one-night stand.
I thought it was meant to end like that.
Until we meet again in an unexpected place.

He eroded her orderly daily life.
Despite knowing it was a dangerous relationship, she couldn't resist him.
What on earth is that man thinking?

"You don't remember?"
The man said with a fierce smile.

"I told you I'd ruin your life."

title: The Law of a Jerk
summary: One day, Charlotte Bennett transferred to Aoyagi Akihito's class. Her proper and refined mannerisms and adorable appearance captured the hearts of his classmates, but Akihito calmly takes a step back, feeling that she "lives in a different world." However, helping Charlotte's lost sister, Emma, throws his daily life into upheaval...?!

title: When the Black Wolf Calls Me
summary:
"You can never have me. The one who can kill me, is me, not you."

Yeonwoo killed herself in front of her ex-husband who murdered her family. Yet, she found herself back again.

To escape from my ex-husband Hyojo's obsession, to protect my family and to protect myself... I ask another man to take me.

"Hwita, I'll be your woman!"

title: Relationship Principle
summary: While helping a friend confess, Na-yoon unexpectedly receives a confession from the popular Do Seol-woo! Though momentarily shaken by Seol-woo’s unexpected confession, Na-yoon believes that love is still a luxury she can't afford and rejects him. However, Seol-woo isn't ready to give up so easily and asks, "Can't we at least be friends?"

title: The Lone Necromancer
summary:
Seongwu is a former special forces soldier who has returned to college after completing his national service. His ordinary life as a student is shattered during class one day when he and his fellow students are faced with a mysterious prompt asking them to “select a role.”

Seongwu chooses the necromancer, a rare ability that grants him the power to control the undead.

With the campus and outside world seemingly on the brink of collapse, Seongwu must use his newfound powers to battle fearsome monsters and help save his fellow students. But will they make it out alive?

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/silingfashiwanglingzhipeizhe/list?title_no=1981)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/lone-necromancer/list?title_no=3619)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/the-lone-necromancer/list?title_no=4063)

title: Awakening the Purple Thunder at the Beginning
summary: In the world of Blue Star, fierce beasts are rampant. Everyone can awaken superpowers and have the opportunity to become a strong man and dominate the world! However, Xu Jingming, who traveled through time, only had E-level superpowers. Fortunately, the Deep Blue System appeared, and the E-level weak electric superpower was upgraded to S-level Purple Thunder! Killing fierce beasts will earn you superpower points! Superpower points -1500000, Purple Thunder will evolve! SSS-level Chaos Thunder! Thus, the legend of Xu Jingming was left on Blue Star.

title: The Unwelcome Guests of House Fildette
summary:
The 'Count of Fildette's', famous for being scandalous and uneducated. The Counts are the main culprits in eroding the honor of the venerable family, but fortunately, thanks to the couple's clever and lovely only son, 'Hayden', the Countess of Fildette's manages to keep the peace. Hayden is the pride of the count, and at the same time, the only link between the counts and the couple who growls at each other, and the center of peace. But the peace Hayden created is nothing more than a thin ice curtain that hides the depths of the water. Behind it, old misunderstandings, mistrust, and unspeakable secrets are deposited in the far-off darkness... Then one day, unexpected guests suddenly come and walk on the ice curtain?! Peace of those who are slowly cracking! The count struggles with the uncomfortable truth, but he realizes that in the sediment of misunderstandings, the feelings of cherishing each other are together like a treasure. The story of a family who overcame misunderstandings, supports each other, and grows together.
The story of the Count Fildette's family in search of true love and peace.

title: Merry Marbling
summary: When he was young, Lee-ahn found and returned a large bag of money and garnered fame as a "Christmas Angel." Since then, Lee-ahn has been very conscious of how others perceive him. Yugeon, who has just moved into Lee-ahn's building, could care less about the gazes of people around him. He acts out at school and even ditches classes. When she learns of Yugeon's arrival, Lee-ahn's mother hopes that he will take care of the outsider for the sake of his reputation. Reluctantly, Lee-ahn obeys his mother. However, Yugeon realizes that Lee-ahn used him for his own image. When Yugeon threatens to tell Lee-ahn's schoolmates about it, Lee-ahn gets defensive... "I don't care if you tell them. Just know, whatever happens next is not my responsibility." I was just going to end things with no regrets... Just wait! Do whatever you want!! Like a beautiful marbling that doesn't mix with water, these two create a beautiful dissonance.

title: I Became the Tyrant’s Servant
summary: I transmigrated into an explicit 19+ novel as the villain. And it happened to be at the moment when I was about to take over the Emperor on the bed. Until then, I thought I had died without moving a muscle. Enoch Philip de Harte was a tyrant who hated any contact with others. But he insists that I am the cure to melt the ice in his heart and follows me around…

title: Lycan
summary: Set in a fantasy world of swords and magic, the story centers on the titular Lycanthrope Adventure Insurance company. This company provides insurance and support to adventurers taking on the risk of going on a journey and finding a path through the darkness.

title: Imperfect Cinderella Story
summary: Jung Eon is a maid who works in the house of a rich and powerful family. She dreams of escaping a life of servitude and saves every penny she earns. One day, she receives an unexpected proposal from her childhood friend and boss, Hyun Mae-hwa. He's as pretty as a flower, but has a horrible personality. Mae-hwa says he wants to marry her because of a prophecy that says Jung Eon has six benefactors in his destiny. He thinks she is the source of his financial luck. She accepts, thinking it's a chance to change her life.

title: Primordial Ten Fiends: Others Tame Beasts, I Tame Beast Girls
summary: After three years of lying low, Lin Han awakened the Beast Taming System and gained ten ultra-fierce beast girls! Tearing apart enemies by day and taming beast girls by night, he was directly drained by them into becoming the pinnacle of global combat power!

title: I will temporarily protect the male lead
summary:
I somehow took over the body of a villainess in a novel. Originally, I was supposed to die after coveting the male lead, but instead, I decided to become a rich unemployed woman and enjoy a life full of pleasures.

"You said you wanted to raise a puppy, so this brother went to hunt one for you. How's your brother's hunting skills?"

Until my brother came back after hunting the male lead who had turned into a wolf…
–
Having been forced to look after the male lead, I somehow succeeded in taming him after many twists and turns. Now all that's left is to look for this mysterious female lead and hand over the leash, then it will be all over. But…

"Have you become tired of me?"

"No, not at all."

"Then why do you keep trying to send me to a strange person?"

Maybe it's because he has stayed with me for too long, but it seems he has lost his social skills and has also developed separation anxiety.

"That person is someone very important to Your Highness."

"The only person who is important to me is you."

"Are you sure?"

"Yes, because I've imprinted," he whispered and curved the corner of his eyes, "on you."

The half-bent, bright yellow eyes were brimming with obsession.

---
Rosetta Kazel is enjoying her life as the villainess of a novel, until she's given a silver wolf to be her new pet. Rosetta knows this is none other than the cursed male lead of the novel, Prince Sihael von Idris, who's become stuck in his wolf form! To follow the novel, all Rosetta has to do is look after the wolf prince until the female lead can show up. But what if events have changed so much from the novel that she never turns up? How long will Rosetta be stuck caring for this unruly pup?

---

[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/55937153)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%A8%EC%A3%BC%EB%A5%BC-%EC%9E%84%EC%8B%9C%EB%B3%B4%ED%98%B8-%EC%A4%91%EC%9E%85%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/3091), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60651851)

title: The Real Daughter, She Is an Almighty Boss
summary: A highly skilled fighter wakes up in someone else's body and discovers that she's the Huffmans' lost daughter Gemma, regarded as socially inferior to her adoptive sister and a human punching bag for her Aunt Elodie. Her father doesn't care about her. Her mother is ashamed of her. Just when everyone thinks Gemma is going to make a complete fool of herself, they get a slap in the face.

title: After Improperly Licking a Dog, I Became a Billionaire
summary: Once a typical simp, Lin Xin’s life takes a drastic turn when he’s dumped and inherits a divine financial system—starting him off with a whopping trillion yuan! But there’s a twist: he can only spend this fortune on women. Stuck with this bizarre stipulation, Lin Xin is forced to navigate an unconventional and thrilling path to wealth and power, transforming from a mere simp to a legendary tycoon.

title: 13th Prince
summary:
The strongest female assassin from a special assassination force met her death one day on a mission. To her surprise, she woke up in the body of a 13 year old girl, Mu Rong Liu Yue. Through Liu Yue's past memories, she found out that she was bullied due to the huge birthmark on her face, even though she came from a renowned family.  
  
LLS: The hiatus that the author took has been almost a year already… 100% its done. Sorry guys

title: Emperor of Solo Play
summary:
Betrayed by his guild and defeated by a top player, Hyrkan loses everything. Before he can get revenge, a fatal accident ends his life — only for him to wake up years in the past, back at the start of Warlord. 

Now, with his memories intact, he’s determined to rise to the top alone. But in a game where power means everything, can he truly survive without any allies? 

The Emperor of Solo Play is back, and this time, he’s playing by his own rules.

title: Zombie Dad
summary:
A world overrun by zombies, and 100 chances for Ryu Min-Seok to save his daughter. But just when he's about to fail for the 100th time, he comes back to life?! 

The zombie apocalypse survival story of a father who awakens as a zombie to protect his daughter!

title: Red Shirt
summary: The legend of the killer company, Cha Si-hyuk. He decides to retire after meeting the woman he loves, but the company has no intention of letting him go easily. Eventually, everything starts to be taken away from him, and Cha Si-hyuk takes up the sword again. Revenge begins, and the war with the huge organization ‘Neville’ becomes unavoidable… What will be left at the end of the sword of revenge?

title: The Arrogant Man’s Secretary
summary:
Da-young Yoon is an elite in the secretarial world, has a smart job, and has a beautiful appearance. Perfection at work, with a thorough separation between public and private lives... Perfect in every aspect, she is forced to change her job due to her boss's scandal. That night. On the way home after part-time work, Da-yong, who is in trouble due to a drunken person, meets a man and who helps her. But that's not all, there are unexpected hugs, nosebleeds, and even kisses! 

"Thank you, Boeun." 
"Yeah?" 
"Lips, nosebleeds, lifesavers. Isn't it something that can't be overlooked?" 

Dayoung hands her flyer to a man who insists on her reward, saying it is her own business card, and she runs away. The man is her new boss, the president of the Koryo Hotel. Without even dreaming that it was Kang Do Hoon. 

"Ah~ Was this the place you moved to? Not a knight"... Ruined. Is the dismissal confirmed from the first day? A sweet and bloody male romance between Da-young Yoon, and Kang Do-hoon, an arrogant man!

title: Steal the Child of the Terminally Ill
summary: “Are you going to leave your child with a terminally ill mother?”The future that the magic mirror, a relic from my parents, showed me was horrifying. A future where I would be a terminally ill mother and my husband’s mistress would demand that I leave my child behind. We’re not even married yet, so maybe we can avoid that unhappy future. You, who resemble the cold snowy fields of the north, cannot hold me. So why are your eyes so hot as you look at me as we speak of parting?”When the old duke dies, we will part ways.””If we don’t have kids, we’ll be fine, right? So don’t even think about divorce. Just stay by my side.”I felt the warmth of your lips on mine as you carefully moved closer. But the deep kiss was just the beginning of a long night ahead.

title: Not Just the Two of Us
summary: The same part-time job, the same surname, the same family environment - other than that, Satou Yuna and Satou Ema have absolutely nothing in common. But due to a strange twist of fate they end up sharing an apartment... Sometimes they fight, but maybe it's because they're total opposites that they can be together. A new-generation of girls story about young women who live flexibly and resiliently!

title: In the Doghouse
summary: The Devon family sits on a mountain of debt and they are on the brink of bankruptcy. This is no fault of hers of course, but Courtney Devon has always been the one painted as the villain in her family. However, the family is in dire straits and they have to do something, anything, to raise some money and get out of this situation. But then one day, news arrives from the Imperial Palace that His Royal Highness the crown prince has decided to make Courtney the crown princess. Seemingly a typical prince on the outside, His Royal Highness is actually quite a troublemaker with a dark side. Will this arrangement end up solving Courtney Devon’s problems or just complicating things further? Will a love against all odds bloom or will someone end up in the doghouse...?

title: Disaster Is Always Nearby
summary: Everything seems perfect in Dami Yun's life. Her career prospects look bright, and her childhood crush Ho-won even moved back to Korea to confess to her. But her world turns upside down when an anonymous letter leads her to a mysterious house, where she ends up trapped for three hours… except in the outside world, a decade has passed and Dami has been declared dead! Can Jaenan, the mysterious, surly god and owner of the home, help her navigate this chaos? Why does disaster strike wherever she goes? And why is this unhelpful god having prophetic dreams about them being together?!

title: If You Desire to Keep Me [Official]
summary: Kisa’s world shatters when she hears her fiancé Daniel has another woman. She confronts him, expecting denial but Daniel doesn’t just lie; he mocks her, calling her stupid. Betrayed and trapped by her father’s refusal to let her break the engagement, Kisa’s fate feels sealed until Seyodd, the new duke and her late brother’s replacement, steps into her life. A secret contract marriage with him becomes her only escape. Just when she thinks she’s found freedom, a chilling letter from Daniel warns her about Seyodd’s dangerous secret. What darkness is Seyodd hiding beneath his noble mask?

title: You are pretty
summary: This is the typical protagonist setting so my cheats should be coming, right! Unexpectedly, that night, my fiancée suddenly took back her words: I won’t annul this marriage! I want us to live and sleep together! I’ll also take care of all our living expenses! Okay, let’s do it, I have nothing to lose anyway. After one night… Eh, there’s something a bit wrong with my fiancée?

title: I’m a Villainess Devoted to My Favorite Character, So What?
Lantern Of The Dawn
summary: While you were admiring the girl in the next seat, she might be eyeing you up, too…? A new kind of “neighborly” short-form pure love comedy!

title: Thiendavis – For The Perfect Salvation
summary: Evie Ariatte, a lovely saintess candidate, has her bright future shattered when a sudden curse forces her to answer every question with the truth. This unexpected twist of fate threatens her reputation and jeopardizes her dream of becoming the saintess. As her blunt honesty earns her both friends and enemies, will Evie uncover the hidden truths of Thiendavis and bring about its perfect salvation?

title: The Way That Knight Lives As a Lady
summary:
The sword of my closest friend and trusted adjutant pierced my body. When I opened my eyes again, I had become a noble lady of the enemy kingdom. In an unfamiliar and weak stranger’s body, three year’s time was lost, in which my homeland was brought to ruin. I was unable to come to my senses because of the pain of betrayal and confusion of my identity. However, eventually I decided to live on as 'Luciphella Aidine', a noble who wields a sword.  


---

title: Genius Hitter Hits Fastball
summary:
Even he, Kang Geon-woo, a genius major leaguer who gained wealth, fame, and everything, could not continue a happy married life with his wife. He, who felt regretful about his wife's absence, returned to the past with the power of a mysterious ring.

As a high school student in the midst of a fresh romance, will he be able to find love this time?

title: Magic Emperor
summary:
Because he had the heritage of the ancient Demonic Emperor, Demonic Emperor Zhuo Yifan met the misfortune of being betrayed and killed by his trusted disciple. After being reborn, his cultivation went back to zero and he was trapped by a heart demon, given no choice but to become the housekeeper of the Luo Family's lone eldest miss. From being a Magic Emperor to being an insignificant housekeeper, how would he get along with his "heart demon eldest miss" and what power would he gain in order to lead himself and the declining family to rise back to the peak of the continent!


---

**Note:** 魔 can mean "magic" and "demon", while 管家 can mean "butler" and "housekeeper". I'm not sure as to why the previous translator decided to use "Magic" when it's a cultivation world, but I'll just follow. And Zhou Fan never does the work of a housekeeper throughout the manhua.

---

[Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-servant-is-the-demon-king/info)

title: Maru is a Puppy
summary:
The Hero's son and the ghost of the Demon King are the master and disciple!?

Earth, the son of Hero, the Hero who defeated the Great Demon King, is troubled.
Always expected to achieve great things, but unable to meet those expectations.
No matter the effort he puts in, and the results he obtains, it's never enough.
“You're a disappointment compared to your father.”
“Don't you know you're the son of the hero!!”
Living every day like this, Earth meets his destiny in the room containing his father's sword.

“Interesting. I will train you. I have only free time now.”

Earth receives special personal training from the Demon King just to get back at his parents and the world.
In the coming days, his parents, the heroes of the past, his first love, his princess childhood friend, the geniuses of the era, and the world will tremble before him.

**Note:** While initially released with the “What's Wrong With The Hero's Son Being The Demon King's Disciple?” subtitle, in line with the web and light novels, the manga switched to the new “Boy Meets Satan” subtitle by the release of the 1st volume.
___
**Character Designer:** [Ryuutetsu](https://mangadex.org/author/796d659c-1d83-4956-a7bb-d0bcf8424284)

**Additional Links:**
- Official Raw Web Novel: [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/1177354054918478427), [Shousetsuka ni Narou](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9185fm)

title: I’m Attracted to You
summary:
Takemura wakes up after falling ill for 3 days and realizes the world has been overrun by zombies, but for some strange reason, he's not being attacked by them! What will he do now with this great power he has?
___
**Character Designer:** [Saburou](https://mangadex.org/author/9db8b2d0-08d1-46a7-be91-a0277faf1b70)

title: The genius midfielder’s passes are special
summary:
"Song Yoo-joon, who loves soccer more than anyone else, suddenly becomes color blind and has to give up soccer. Fifteen years pass, and he dies an unjust death.

"Please... Just one more time on the field..."

In that moment, he returns to the days when he could see colors 15 years ago. As he prepares to kick the ball, filled with joy at the prospect of playing football again, he suddenly begins to see strange lights.

A modern sports fantasy where he becomes a genius midfielder as he sees the various colors that reveal the flow of the game!

title: Aristocrat’s Revenge
summary: No summary available.

title: Goddess’s Way of Attacking Tigers
summary: Moha, the sun god, was betrayed by her lover and died a miserable death. She realizes that she has returned to her past a year ago while being possessed by the body of an unknown woman. Moha struggles to prevent the tragedy of her past life. But, unexpectedly for her, her two tiger gods, who belonged to her in the past, spread their fervent courtship towards her.

title: If You Don’t Love, You Die
summary:
Despite being from a prestigious noble family, Bridget, a failed daughter who made a contract with the weakest spirit, one day had her engagement broken off by the third prince, Joseph.

However, no one sympathized with her, who was acting as a proud daughter at the behest of Joseph... At that time, Bridget meets the Duke's son Yuri, who is feared by those around him because of his overwhelming ability and cold personality.

Two people who hate each other and repel each other. However, the encounter gradually changes their destinies. This is the story of a villainess who is despised for being incompetent and a villain who is shunned for being a genius who eventually fall in love.

---
Despite her noble status, Brigitte contracts with the weakest type of spirit—and on that very same day, the prince publicly breaks off their engagement. No one shows much sympathy towards the once haughty young lady—except for the duke's son, Yuri, who attends the same magic academy. Yuri is feared for his incredible abilities and icy personality, but with him on her side, her fortunes might have changed…

---
**Original Web Novel:** [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816700426830814673), [Syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9923hb/)

title: Don’t Cling To The Dead Villain
summary:
In a world that resembles an otome game, the villainess is determined to rewrite her fate!

Iris Gray, the daughter of a duke in the Kingdom of Calm, was living the life of a typical noble lady… until one day, she suddenly regained memories of her past life.
There, she realized she had once played a famous romance game — and now, she had been reincarnated as the villainess, destined to be executed for harassing the heroine known as “the Savior.”

With death looming as her scripted ending, Iris resolves to avoid her tragic fate at all costs.
Her first step?
Breaking off her engagement to Prince Elliot, the key figure in her downfall.
But there’s a catch — Elliot is so in love with her that he outright refuses to let her go.

Amid this inner and outer turmoil, a hidden power awakens within Iris — a unique magical gift called “Perception,” which grants her complete control over all forms of magic!

With this newfound ability, Iris realizes she may finally hold the key to reshaping her destiny… and preventing the execution scene that awaits her in the game’s original plot.

Can a so-called villainess truly survive and write herself a new ending?

A tale of romance, fantasy, and a brave rebellion against fate — the journey to flip destiny begins now!
